I absolutely love this game, the experience it gave me was very memorable. There was never a dull moment while playing it, I'm not that smart but this game shows that even dumb people can actually solve puzzles! I didn't look up any walkthroughs or tutorials and I'm very proud to say that. I have already finished the first game prior to playing this one, the things that I loved from the first installment came back with additional mechanics, and the story, it picked up from the last game with a twist. The length of the game left me satisfied because it was just right, not too short, unlike the first game and not too long. Miku Hatsune gave us yet another astounding song, although I liked the first one better.

I'm looking forward to a third game if ever there are plans for it, but I guess there's no hope until Half-Life 3 is confirmed.
